name: SUPER TANKAGEDDON
description:
Survive the post-apocaliptic wasteland left by the alien wars in your brightly coloured tank! Another absurdly difficult and short  game by Gorypixels ;P

CONTROLS

  • ESDF To move
  • Arrow Keys to shoot (Hold it for auto-fire!)
  • X to restart after a Game Over
  • Z to go back to the Title Screen

WARNING

This game contains flashing lights that could trigger an epileptic seizure
